knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = 'hide')

```{r}
tar_load(inventories)
tar_load(sales)
```

```{r plot-data, results='asis'}

# Combine data
pubs <-
  list(inventories,
       sales)

res <- lapply(pubs, function(x) {

  knitr::knit_child(text = c(

    '\n',
    '## `r x$meta$publication[1]` (`r format(max(x$meta$end), "%b %Y")`)',
    '## `r x$meta$table[1]`',
    '\n',
    '```{r, out.height="100%", out.width="100%"}',
    'create_tsplot_table(x)',
    '```'
     ),
     envir = environment(),
     quiet = TRUE)
})

cat(unlist(res), sep = "\n")
```
